Caption:Diagram of the proposed Gaussian diffusion sinogram inpainting algorithm . From the uncorrected image, the prior image and metal-only image are obtained . The corresponding sinograms are yielded via forward projection . The gradient descent algorithm and POCS process are applied to restore the sinogram . The final corrected image is reconstructed via the FBP method from the corrected sinogram.
Question:What are the inputs for the proposed inpainting algorithm?
Answer:Prior image and metal-only image
